climatePledgeFriendly.details: Compact by Design (Certified by Amazon) products remove excess air and water, which reduces the carbon footprint of shipping and packaging. The Forest Stewardship Council certified products support responsible forestry, helping keep forests healthy for future generations.

features: 💚 GENTLE ON THE PLANET: Contribute to the conservation of ecosystems throughout the world by making the eco smart switch to biodegradable baby wipes, fully compliant with the Forest Stewardship Council (FSC) – which promotes environmentally appropriate, socially beneficial, and economically viable management of the world’s forests.

💚 GENTLE ON BABY'S SKIN: No plastics. No parabens. No alcohol. No synthetics. No harsh chemicals. Purity that parents can trust. Moistened with 99% pure water, our unscented baby wipes are gentle enough for wiping the delicate skin of newborn infants & premature babies.

💚 GOING GREEN MADE EASY: Ordinary wipes & diapers get a bad rap because they pollute our world. Our goal is to bring green products to parents more easily & thus save the planet for future generations. Fully, 100% biodegradable baby towelettes and wipes effectively lessen human impact on the environment. Cruelty-free, degradable & completely honest.

💚 RAPID DECOMPOSITION: Unlike other wipes, these eco-friendly baby wipes are made out of materials sourced straight from the earth. Derived from trees, the all-natural viscose material quickly breaks down & fully disintegrates back into the ground in several months rather than 100+ years.

💚 HAPPINESS GUARANTEED: Big, thick & just as effective as traditional baby wipes, our towelettes are sure to impress. We back every pack with a risk-free guarantee. Full refunds issued for returns within 30 days. Place your order now!

productInformation.name: Safety warning
productInformation.value: ‎For external use only. To avoid danger of choking or suffocation keep packaging and wipes out of reach of children. Avoid direct contact with eyes. Discontinue use if irritation or redness develops. Dispose of in household trash – DO NOT FLUSH. Store in cool dry place.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 6 pack Sented baby wipes 12 pack Unsented baby wipes 12 pack Sented baby wipes

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars We love that these are biodegradable!
reviews.reviewText: Our baby has been using these since birth and has never had diaper rash. These wipes have a mild smell, and do not easily rip apart like other wipes can (so less risk that a baby may find a piece somewhere and put it in their mouth).We're also happy to know that they are biodegradable, and feel that the price is quite affordable compared to other options.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great eco-friendly wipes
reviews.reviewText: We get these delivered monthly and love that they are quality wipes that are also eco-friendly. Great product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars not sure about flushing, but best product out there
reviews.reviewText: the flushable wipes like this tear up easily and aren't sturdy, create a mess. these are great. the right sturdiness not to burst through... easy on the skin too -

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Decent quality, smaller size than most
reviews.reviewText: Decent quality product yet smaller sized wipes than other companies we've used. (The only reason I marked 4 stars vs 5.) The wipes do have a slight texture to them allowing for easier removal of "sticky" situations. They are also a bit thinner than others which does not seem to affect performance in any way. No scent which is perfect for our sensitive allergy family. They are tough and I have yet to have any tear apart. We use wipes for potty clean up, camping, you name it. These are great and I hope they really are bio so we can do our part protecting our Earth.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Thin and Strong Wipes
reviews.reviewText: The wipes are thin but strong. Being thin they take up less space, packs are smaller. And they are strong enough that they don't break during use. They are large enough to be effective for clean ups. They are moist enough to work without too much moisture that would result in drips. And they are easy on the environment. The package does not say if they are flushable or not. I do not flush them and would not even if they are quickly biodegradable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 25, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I researched biodegradable/compostable wipes & this brand is one of the few legitimate ones I could find. They do not have a scent & are thinner than most disposable wipes, but that's a fair trade off for a truly green product. These work well, stay moist, & are affordable. I'm almost through my first box & will be repurchasing soon.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Earth and Baby Friendly Wipes
reviews.reviewText: I'm really enjoying these wipes so far. They are soft, clean well and I love that they are biodegradable and don't have any "crappy" ingredients. They also have a pleasant scent, even though they're unscented - nothing perfume-y, just not the typical, somewhat unpleasant, "unscented" smell that other products give off. Very comfortable to use and, lastly, each wipe comes out of the package easily bringing the top of the next wipe with it, which I really appreciate! With so many other brands, I have to dig for the next wipe and tend to pull out half the package at once, which is annoying. These are great all-around!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I purchased these for when I have my grandkids with me at my house. I wanted something that was plant-based without harsh chemicals. Although it says these are unscented, they do have an odd odor to them, which I do not care for.I will be buying water wipes in the future. Instead of these, I cannot stand the odor.
